title: Looking at paperwork
creator_credit: Rank Organisation Film Productions, British Productivity Council and Robert Parker
brief_description: Presents an Organisation and Methods approach to administrative practice, showing typical ways of improving its efficiency. Two questions are asked - “How is the work being done?” and “Is the work being done really necessary?”.
creator_credit_for_label: Rank Organisation Film Productions, British Productivity Council and Robert Parker
